trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件時選取的按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Select") 按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制處理選取的作業。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消選取作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您以判斷使用者所選取的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消選取作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消選取作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object passed to the event-handling method to cancel the select operation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the user selects an author with the last name White.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以取消選取作業的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制當使用者選取具有姓氏白色作者。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row to select in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中選取之新資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Initial value

trans-unit.source: The value of the `newSelectedIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `newSelectedIndex` 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the new row to select in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中選取之新資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row to select in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中選取之新資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs the select operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property of the control cannot be used to determine the index of the new row selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件發生之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項執行選取的作業，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>控制項的屬性不能用來判斷使用者選取新的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property still contains the index of the previously selected row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性仍包含先前選取的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the new row selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷使用者選取新的資料列的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically override the row index selected by the user by setting it to another value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，若要以程式設計方式覆寫使用者所選取設定為另一個值的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the row selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>屬性來判斷使用者所選取的資料列索引。
